verses.name: Hosea 4:1
verses.text: Hear the word of the Lord, ye children of Israel: for the Lord hath a controversy with the inhabitants of the land, because there is no truth, nor mercy, nor knowledge of God in the land.

verses.name: Hosea 4:2
verses.text: By swearing, and lying, and killing, and stealing, and committing adultery, they break out, and blood toucheth blood.

verses.name: Hosea 4:3
verses.text: Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.
